page.title: 13SHOPPING IN MISSON
page.content: In Misson my parents own a shop called central stores.The shop has a house joined to it and we sell a variety of things for example groceries,wool,knitting needles,dog food ETC.We open at 9 am until 1 pm when we have our dinner hour.The shop re opens at 2pm until 6pm.The Post Office also has a shop attached to it and sells a variety of things like groceries,sweets,toys and vegatables.The person who owns the Post Office has owned the shop for 15 years.He says he enjoys his job because he meets a lot of people.His toys and fancy goods sell very well.The busiest day in the Post Office is Thursdays because of the older people going to draw out there pension.
